description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hit the ball as hard as you can to increase the jackpot, slam it on your opponent's wall and grab the accumulated score! Test your skills playing with a friend or against the AI!  Updated with an additional table!
